p.note: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines have been preserved on all four sides. There are several small holes in the papyrus along a vertical folding line which have caused minimal damage to the text. Recto is written in black ink with a thick pen perpendicular to the fibers, Verso is written parallel to the fibers.
